com.smartitengineering.version.api
Interface Content

All Known Subinterfaces:
MutableResource, Resource
All Known Implementing Classes:
InputStreamContentImpl, ResourceImpl, StringContentImpl
public interface Content

Author:
imyousuf

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getContent()
          Retrieves the content of the resource, it can be anything that represents the resource.
 java.io.InputStream getContentAsStream()
          Return the input stream for reading the content.
 int getContentSize()
          Retrieve the length of the content.
 boolean isContentLoaded()
          Retrieves whether the content is fully read from the stream or not.
 

Method Detail

getContent

java.lang.String getContent()
                            throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
Retrieves the content of the resource, it can be anything that represents the resource.

Returns:
Content of the resource
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if isContentLoaded returns false or getContentSize() < 0

getContentAsStream

java.io.InputStream getContentAsStream()
Return the input stream for reading the content.

Returns:
Stream representing the content; NULL iff the resource is marked for delete

getContentSize

int getContentSize()
Retrieve the length of the content. It could be used to determine the number of bytes expected from the input stream and if isContentLoaded is true then getContent().length() and its value is same.

Returns:
Length/size of the content; should be non-negative

isContentLoaded

boolean isContentLoaded()
Retrieves whether the content is fully read from the stream or not. If true then it is safe to invoke getContent().

Returns:
True if and only if the cotent stream has reached EOF.
